name: Ethnicity, Race and Migration
description: A theoretical and empirical examination of ethnic identity formation, race and racism, and their relationship to international migration.
prerequisites: [[SOCB05H3 or STAB23H3] and [0.5 credit from the following: SOCB30H3, SOCB42H3, SOCB43H3, SOCB47H3]] or [SOCB60H3 and an additional 8.0 credits and enrolment in the Minor in Critical Migration Studies]
